data.eml:eml: New species of Plesionika Bate, 1888 (Crustacea, Decapoda, Pandalidae) from Southwestern Atlantic

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cardoso, Irene A. (2011): New species of Plesionika Bate, 1888 (Crustacea, Decapoda, Pandalidae) from Southwestern Atlantic. Zootaxa 3089: 51-59, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.206633
